content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mining operation at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position (43.0, -82.0) and a Chest at position (42.5, -83.5) to store the mined coal.

### Coal storage at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a Chest at position (42.5, -83.5) to store coal.

### Coal storage at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5)
Consists of a Chest at position (43.5, -79.5) to store coal.

### Iron plate production at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Furnace at position (41.0, -82.0) to smelt iron plates.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from a chest
- Ensure the chest contains the item you are trying to extract before attempting extraction.
- Check the chest's inventory to avoid attempting to extract items that are not present.

### Errors when mining with a Burner Mining Drill
- Ensure the drill is fueled before attempting to mine.
- Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining when it is full.

### Errors when using a Burner Inserter
- Ensure the inserter has a source of items to pick up before attempting to use it.
- Check the neighbours of the inserter to ensure it can drop items into a chest.
